metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12123 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Node.js: All versions prior to Node.js 6.15.0, 8.14.0, 10.14.0 and 11.3.0:Hostname spoofing in URL parser for javascript protocol: If a Node.jsapplication is using url.parse() to determine the URL hostname, thathostname can be spoofed by using a mixed case "javascript:" (e.g."javAscript:") protocol (other protocols are not affected). If securitydecisions are made about the URL based on the hostname, they may beincorrect.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
